Info.Name: Squire's Sword
Info.Desc: A sword for Apprentice-level Paladins. Mainly used for standard practice, it's quite weak.

Info.Name: Bronze Sword
Info.Desc: A sword made of copper. Novices can use it well, but it's a bit weak.

Info.Name: Iron Sword
Info.Desc: A heavy sword made of iron. It's often mentioned by old swordsmen when they talk about the past. It can be used by both novices and veterans.

Info.Name: Silver Sword
Info.Desc: This silver sword is light and easy to use, but it also requires a certain skill from its wielder.

Info.Name: Gold Sword
Info.Desc: A shiny sword made of gold. The centrifugal force brought by the weight of the blade can be used to deal a heavy blow.

Info.Name: Captain's Sword
Info.Desc: The saber of the captains of the Paladins. It's also used when demonstrating swordsmanship to soldiers.

Info.Name: Paladin's Sword
Info.Desc: The official equipment of the Castele Paladins. They use this sword for great military exploits.

Info.Name: Maajik Blade
Info.Desc: The official equipment of the Al Maajik magic soldiers. Although it's mass-produced, it works well.

Info.Name: Strauss the Holy Blade
Info.Desc: A holy sword that perfectly embodies the saying "a good offense is the best defense." The remaining power of the strongest knight of ancient times empowers its wielder.

PassiveProperties.Name: Residue in the Sword
PassiveProperties.Desc: Significantly increases ATK and Light ATK.

PassiveProperties.Name: Residue in the Sword
PassiveProperties.Desc: Significantly increases ATK and Light ATK.

Info.Name: Gallant Blade
Info.Desc: A famous sword made by a master craftsman. The design is unique and powerful.

Info.Name: Joyeuse
Info.Desc: A magic sword made with the best materials and the most superb skills.

Info.Name: Crystal Sword
Info.Desc: A sword that can complement those with a pure and clear mind. People with dark hearts will make it lose its brilliance.

Info.Name: Key Cutter
Info.Desc: An incredible sword said to be able to unshackle a monster's mind.

Info.Name: Bone Sword
Info.Desc: A cursed sword that is said to require great courage and strong will to control it.

Info.Name: Adventurer's Sword
Info.Desc: Passed down from generation to generation, this sword has the soul of an ancient adventurer residing within.

Info.Name: Red Brass Sword
Info.Desc: A sword made of Red Ingots. Lightweight and easy to use. It's slightly hot.

Info.Name: Relic Sword
Info.Desc: A sword carried by ancient soldiers. It was made with lost technology.

Info.Name: Blossom Blade
Info.Desc: A famous sword with a heart of justice as its soul. Holding it in your hand, you can't help but be infected by its heart of justice.

Info.Name: Rune Sword
Info.Desc: A sword having accumulated many fierce curses. It will eat into the heart of its wielder.

Info.Name: Divine Blade
Info.Desc: A sacred sword that has received a divine blessing. The wielder can obtain power comparable to that of the gods.

Info.Name: Dragonslayer
Info.Desc: A sword used by the legendary Dragon King, which has been passed down from ancient times to the present day.

Info.Name: Erik's Sword
Info.Desc: A sword used by King Erik in his youth. It's one of the heirlooms of the Castele royal family.

Info.Name: Verdant Blade
Info.Desc: The treasured blade of the sea breeze, left behind by the Pirate King. The carved lines on the sword make it able to use the power of the Wind.

PassiveProperties.Name: Defeating an enemy insignificantly restores SP
PassiveProperties.Desc: Defeating an enemy insignificantly restores SP

PassiveProperties.Name: Defeating an enemy insignificantly restores SP
PassiveProperties.Desc: Defeating an enemy insignificantly restores SP

Info.Name: Glenn's Claymore_Discarded
Info.Desc: The beloved weapon of a dragon-slaying hero. It records a blood-red history.

Info.Name: Novice's Claymore
Info.Desc: The first greatsword used by novices. It's used for practice, so it's quite weak.

Info.Name: Bronze Claymore
Info.Desc: A greatsword made of copper. Its power is nothing special. Its weight and size are both handy.

Info.Name: Iron Claymore
Info.Desc: A heavy iron greatsword. It's suitable for a fighting style that uses brute force.

Info.Name: Silver Claymore
Info.Desc: A lightweight silver greatsword. Suitable for intermediate swordsmen with certain skills.

Info.Name: Gold Claymore
Info.Desc: A greatsword made of gold. The heavy blade means high destructive power.

Info.Name: Flamberge
Info.Desc: A greatsword designed in the shape of a swaying flame. It has a unique slicing feeling.

Info.Name: Arcana Blade
Info.Desc: A greatsword infused with magical power. You can feel its surging mana when you hold it in your hands.

Info.Name: Demonic Void
Info.Desc: A greatsword infused with an evil power. If you don't control it when you use it, your mind will be corrupted.

Info.Name: Crescent Blade
Info.Desc: A greatsword created to end chaos. The moonlight it emits can bring light to a world shrouded in darkness.

Info.Name: Giga Buster
Info.Desc: A legendary greatsword used by divine giants in the age of the gods. It's said that this sword can cut even the earth.

Info.Name: Champion's Blade
Info.Desc: A sword used by ancient heroes. It has created countless legends.

Info.Name: Apocalypse
Info.Desc: A greatsword full of the wrath of crabs. Humans cannot wield it with two hands.

Info.Name: Berserker's Rage
Info.Desc: A bloodthirsty sword that can charm the wielder. It kills whoever stands in its way, even gods and devils.

Info.Name: Lunare Blade
Info.Desc: A sacred greatsword with supernatural power. Boiling blood that has been passed down since ancient times is flowing within it.

Info.Name: Furia del Mar
Info.Desc: A greatsword used by the legendary king of sea, which has been passed down since ancient times in Port Puerto.

Info.Name: Odin's Blade
Info.Desc: Odin's favorite greatsword. It seems to have its own will.

Info.Name: Sword of Heroes
Info.Desc: A greatsword used by an ancient hero. The blade is quite heavy.

Info.Name: Hunter's Bow
Info.Desc: A bow used by novice Hunters for practice. Don't have any illusions about its power.

Info.Name: Oak Bow
Info.Desc: A slightly better bow made of oak wood. It's easy to use and rather popular.

Info.Name: Pine Bow
Info.Desc: A slightly stiffer bow made of pine wood. It tests the user's arm strength.

Info.Name: Palm Bow
Info.Desc: A bow made of tough palm wood. It's easy to use once you get used to it.

Info.Name: Sugar Bow
Info.Desc: A bow made from sugar trees. All aspects are well-balanced and easy to use.

Info.Name: Orca Bow
Info.Desc: A bow that many first-class Hunters long to have. It can shoot arrows with the momentum of a whale spout.

Info.Name: Flaming Bow
Info.Desc: A bow that supports a Hunter who bravely journeys forward. The arrows it shoots are as gorgeous as a phoenix in flight.

Info.Name: Red Dragon Bow
Info.Desc: Legend has it that this bow possesses the power of a dragon. It has a very destructive power.

Info.Name: Destiny Bow
Info.Desc: Abandon yourself and become one with nature. A bow made specifically for those who have reached the pinnacle of archery.

Info.Name: Forest Bow
Info.Desc: The best bow that can only be used by those who bear the fate of the forest. It's also known as the Bow of the Forest Ranger.

Info.Name: Primal Dragon Bow
Info.Desc: A bow made with techniques passed down from the ancient times. The user will gain the great power of an ancient dragon.

Info.Name: Hermes' Bow
Info.Desc: Legend has it that this bow was used by gods in ancient times. It's said that the arrow it shoots can turn into a galloping gale in the air.

Info.Name: Heartbreaker
Info.Desc: It's said that the bow can destroy the spirit of its target. If you don't concentrate, you will go insane.

Info.Name: Thunderstrike Bow
Info.Desc: A bow that can gather the power of nature in its shots. The arrows it shoots are as frightening as the anger of the gods.

Info.Name: Spirit King's Bow
Info.Desc: A bow used by the legendary Spirit King. It has been passed down from ancient times to the present day in Elderwood.

Info.Name: Leo's Bow
Info.Desc: Leo's favorite bow. The arrows it fires can tear through even the wind itself.

Info.Name: Novice's Staff
Info.Desc: A staff used to practice magic. Don't have any illusions about its power.

Info.Name: Oak Staff
Info.Desc: A staff made of oak wood. It's lightweight and easy to use, but its power is only so-so.

Info.Name: Pine Staff
Info.Desc: A staff made of pine tree wood. It can better transform the user's mana.

Info.Name: Palm Staff
Info.Desc: A staff made of palm wood. Its weight and texture make the wielder feel comfortable.

Info.Name: Sugar Staff
Info.Desc: A staff made from sugar trees. Its beautiful wood grain is undeniable.

Info.Name: Mooncrest Staff
Info.Desc: A staff rumored to contain moonlight. It can faintly glow in the dark, guiding the way forward.

Info.Name: Star Staff
Info.Desc: A staff rumored to contain starlight. It will shine in the dark.

Info.Name: Bat Wing Staff
Info.Desc: A staff rumored to contain magical power. If you look closely, you will find that it's faintly covered by darkness.

Info.Name: Dragon's Tail
Info.Desc: A staff that hosts a dragon's vitality. The magic cast by it can penetrate the sky.

Info.Name: Purrfection Staff
Info.Desc: A staff made in the shape of a cat's paw. When you're busy, you can't help but want to borrow it.

Info.Name: Staff of Wisdom
Info.Desc: It's said that this ancient wood has gained a life of its own after passing through the hands of many wielders, making it a living staff.

Info.Name: Serpent Staff
Info.Desc: A legendary staff that is exceptional in all respects. Only a real Magician can use it.

Info.Name: Primal Dragon Staff
Info.Desc: A staff made with techniques passed down from the ancient times. The wielder will gain the wisdom of an ancient dragon.

Info.Name: Bon Bon-Bon
Info.Desc: An incredible staff with a little sweetness. But you can't underestimate its attack power.

Info.Name: Chaos Bringer
Info.Desc: A staff that hosts a devil's soul. It can transform the darkness in the wielder's heart into mana.

Info.Name: Staff of Dawn
Info.Desc: A staff that hosts the soul of a god. It possesses the power to seal evil.

Info.Name: Dark Sultan's Staff
Info.Desc: A staff used by the legendary Dark Sultan, spoke of in Al Maajik legends passed down orally since ancient times.

Info.Name: Esmerelda's Staff
Info.Desc: Esmerelda's favorite staff. It's full of ancient wisdom.

Info.Name: General Test Sword
Info.Desc: General Test Sword_Description

Info.Name: Bare-handed Weapon Model
Info.Desc: (input description)

Info.Name: Flower Savior
Info.Desc: It was once the close-fitting rapier of a beautiful wielder. Her heroic, flower-like fighting posture when using this sword is still a topic of soldiers after dinner.

Info.Name: Commander's Sword
Info.Desc: A sword held by the highest commander of all armies.

Info.Name: Caterpillo Savior
Info.Desc: A magical sword that can spit out silk thread to attack like a Caterpillo. It's especially effective against insect monsters.

Info.Name: Toy Sword
Info.Desc: A sword that children who have aspirations to become Paladins beg their parents for. It's especially effective against ape monsters.

Info.Name: Guardian Sword
Info.Desc: A defensive sword that doesn't leave any flaws when attacking.

Info.Name: Dragoon's Sword
Info.Desc: A sword used by the Dragon Hunter who has clarified the master-slave relationship between dragons and humans.

Info.Name: Crusader's Sword
Info.Desc: (input description) Crusader's Sword

Info.Name: Heat Savior
Info.Desc: A sword containing the power of Fire. Each of its slashes is accompanied by a mirage. Effective against Earth monsters.

Info.Name: Splash Savior
Info.Desc: A sword containing the power of Water. The water spray surrounded by the sword body will splash at the enemy when attacking, making Fire enemies retreat in fear.

Info.Name: Leaf Sword
Info.Desc: A sword containing the power of Earth. Its heavy blade tip can't be deflected even by Wind-type guards.

Info.Name: Gale Sword
Info.Desc: A sword containing the power of Wind. When you swing this sword, you can hear the roar of a storm.

Info.Name: Squad Captain Sword
Info.Desc: A sword awarded by the king himself to excellent commanders as a testament to the high hopes and trust placed on them.

Info.Name: Festive Hilda Sword
Info.Desc: Festive Hilda (description)

Info.Name: Festive Jake Sword
Info.Desc: Jake's Festive Sword (description)

Info.Name: Black Venom
Info.Desc: A black sword that seems to be able to capture and absorb the surrounding light. A sword with a poisonous fragrance wafting from its blade.

Info.Name: Haniwa Sword
Info.Desc: A ceremonial tool dedicated to the Haniwa Clan, who sometimes use it to craft earthenware jars.

Info.Name: Justice Sword
Info.Desc: A sword that only a determined person who persists in carrying out their own justice can fully wield.

Info.Name: Apple Sword
Info.Desc: A sword favored by the Red Hood Swordsman. The thin and sharp point of the sword can pierce through any evil in an instant.

Info.Name: Apple Sword
Info.Desc: A sword favored by the Red Hood Swordsmen. The thin and sharp point of the sword can pierce through any evil in an instant.

Info.Name: Malicious Sword
Info.Desc: A sword that can easily punish villains. All villains will show respect to those who hold this sword.

Info.Name: Prairie Dragon Sword
Info.Desc: A sword favored by the overlord of the Prairie. Its wielder will be blessed by the Earth.

Info.Name: Red Dragon Sword
Info.Desc: A sword that inherited the soul of the Red Dragon. It sounds like the dragon roaring, and its momentum is like its claw attack. It can deal additional damage to Burning enemies.

Info.Name: Black Dragon Sword
Info.Desc: (input description) Black Dragon Sword

Info.Name: Crystal Sword
Info.Desc: (input description) Crystal Sword

Info.Name: Blue Knights
Info.Desc: A treasured sword overflowing with frigid air that rejects all but its master. Those who are not of noble mind cannot use it.

Info.Name: 5-Star Prom. Test Sword
Info.Desc: Promotion Test Rarity 5 Sword_Description

Info.Name: Aleille's Sword
Info.Desc: Aleille's favorite rapier.

Info.Name: Aleille's Sword
Info.Desc: Aleille's rapier.

Info.Name: Earthdragon Sword
Info.Desc: (input description) Earthdragon Sword

Info.Name: Paladin Sword
Info.Desc: (input description) Paladin Sword

Info.Name: Apegore Sword
Info.Desc: A sword that can exert great power against apes. Even the largest Apegore will tremble in fear when it sees this sword.

Info.Name: Golem Sword
Info.Desc: A sword that can easily smash golems. Although golems are known as "walking fortresses," their armor won't last long in the face of it.

Info.Name: Meteor Sword
Info.Desc: Proof of a Blacksmith becoming an Expert. It's extremely difficult to craft, and accordingly, its attack power is also extremely high.

Info.Name: Vermilion
Info.Desc: A flaming sword sealed with the Power of the Four Gods. It leaves fire damage, instead of just knife wound, scaring its victim with the horror of the battle.

PassiveProperties.Name: Blessing of 4 Gods [Fire]
PassiveProperties.Desc: The Power of the Four Gods grants increased HP, SP, and Fire-type attack.

PassiveProperties.Name: Flaming Claw
PassiveProperties.Desc: Significantly increases damage to Burning targets.

PassiveProperties.Name: Blessing of 4 Gods [Fire]
PassiveProperties.Desc: The Power of the Four Gods grants increased HP, SP, and Fire-type attack.

PassiveProperties.Name: Flaming Claw
PassiveProperties.Desc: Significantly increases damage to Burning targets.

Info.Name: Wind Sword
Info.Desc: Wind Sword (description)

Info.Name: Darkness-tainted Sword
Info.Desc: Corrupted Sword (description)

Info.Name: King Haniwa Sword
Info.Desc: An artifact of the Haniwa Clan. Legend has it that this sword was used by an ancient hero who saved the clan from crisis.

Info.Name: Alpha Apegore Sword
Info.Desc: Apegore King's Sword

Info.Name: Freezing Sword
Info.Desc: A sharp sword made of ice that won't melt. Its coldness can even extinguish flames.

Info.Name: Kingdom Sword
Info.Desc: A sword of the royal family used by their elite Paladin.

Info.Name: Umbrella Sword
Info.Desc: A stylish sword imitating an umbrella. Its blue and white stripes are quite refreshing.

Info.Name: Grand Blaze
Info.Desc: A sword that only Plushling warriors who serve the royal family are allowed to wield. The wielder of this sword will defeat enemies of the royal family.

Info.Name: Flame Cosmo
Info.Desc: The most beautiful sword in the universe, made with a Blacksmith's recipe. It's both beautiful and durable.

Info.Name: Festive Sword
Info.Desc: A sword made in the image of a festive tree. Everyone, let's celebrate!

Info.Name: Phoenix Sword
Info.Desc: A sword symbolizing a blazing phoenix. This blade is imbued with the incredible power of the phoenix. Even if it rusts, it will automatically repair itself.

Info.Name: Twilight Sword
Info.Desc: A sword symbolizing the sunrise. Although its blade is sharp, it's ineffective in combat.

Info.Name: Cortana
Info.Desc: A long sword used by a famous knight.  It's said to be made to commemorate the establishment  of the guard that protect the royal family.

Info.Name: Zenith Cortana
Info.Desc: A long sword used by a meritorious knight. The use of a rare elixir  has increased its brilliance and strength.

Info.Name: Sword of Arcana
Info.Desc: A mysterious sword protected by the Spirit of Earth. A sword with countless legends surrounding it.

PassiveProperties.Name: Significantly increases DMG dealt to targets with Poison
PassiveProperties.Desc:
Significantly increases
damage dealt to targets with Poison

PassiveProperties.Name: Significantly increases DMG dealt to targets with Poison
PassiveProperties.Desc:
Significantly increases
damage dealt to targets with Poison

Info.Name: Gwiver the Dragon Blade
Info.Desc: A sword born from the legendary Red and White Twin Dragons. Whether this sword has the power of the White Dragon is inconclusive, but its strength is indisputable.

Info.Name: Chaotic Ixion
Info.Desc: Usable only by chosen heroes, it's a cruel, vicious, and powerful demonic sword that corrupts even its wielder.

Info.Name: Chaotic Ixion II
Info.Desc: A sword made in imitation of the Chaotic Ixion. It looks just like the real thing.

Info.Name: (New Sword Name)
Info.Desc: (Updated sword description)

Info.Name: Nine-Tailed Rapier
Info.Desc: A simple rapier with a beautiful white blade. It's rumored that a narcissistic noble's son loves to use this sword.

Info.Name: Veggie Claymore
Info.Desc: A greatsword that looks exactly like a carrot. It looks even more carrot-like when buried in the soil. It can exert special effects on vegetable monsters.

Info.Name: Veteran Claymore
Info.Desc: A greatsword with victory, glory, and the humiliation of defeat all embodied in the countless scars engraved on its blade.

Info.Name: Bear Slayer
Info.Desc: A greatsword that can make bears tremble in fear. It scares even the strongest bears in the forest into fleeing.

Info.Name: Red Dragon Claymore
Info.Desc: A greatsword that can cut through a dragon's flames and scales. It can exert special effects on dragons.

Info.Name: Fire Claymore
Info.Desc: A greatsword that hosts the power of Fire. Its flames will engulf the enemy when it's swung. When used against wild beasts, it will give off an enticing barbecue smell.

Info.Name: Water Claymore
Info.Desc: A greatsword that hosts the power of Water. When you slash at an enemy, a small wave will hit them.

Info.Name: Earth Claymore
Info.Desc: A greatsword that hosts the power of Earth. A single blow can smash the ground and use the power of Earth to attack the enemy.

Info.Name: Wind Claymore
Info.Desc: A greatsword that hosts the power of Wind. It releases a powerful shockwave that can blow away enemies using only wind pressure.

Info.Name: Gale Greatsword
Info.Desc: A vicious greatsword capable of making a vicious tiger feel fear for the first time since its birth. It's effective against dragons.

Info.Name: Lion Claymore
Info.Desc: A huge sword with the name of lion. The one who carries it on their shoulder will stand at the apex of beasts.

Info.Name: Lizard Hunter
Info.Desc: A greatsword that devours lizards. It's made using the scales of the century-old Lizard King.

Info.Name: Dino Slayer
Info.Desc: A greatsword that seemingly ended the long history of the dinosaurs. It's effective against dinos.

Info.Name: Victorious Claymore
Info.Desc: It's like a Mercenarydefeated, broken, recast, and having experienced more than a thousand battles.

Info.Name: Turtle Grinder
Info.Desc: A greatsword that can make turtles surrender. Having a harder shell than anyone else, it's proof of being king of the turtles.

Info.Name: Sea Splitter
Info.Desc: (input description) Sea Splitter

Info.Name: Turnip Grater
Info.Desc: A greatsword that works well on vegetables. It's said that Radishies grew their legs to escape from this sword.

Info.Name: Crystal Buster
Info.Desc: (input description) Crystal Buster

Info.Name: Crimson Lucio
Info.Desc: A huge greatsword that hosts the power of Fire. Its hot blade shining with red light can scorch an enemy with a single slash.

PassiveProperties.Name: Bravery
PassiveProperties.Desc: The less HP you have, the more your damage received will be reduced

PassiveProperties.Name: Bravery
PassiveProperties.Desc: The less HP you have, the more your damage received will be reduced

Info.Name: 5-Star Prom. Test Greatsword
Info.Desc: 5-Star Prom. Test Greatsword_description

Info.Name: Prairie Dragon Claymore
Info.Desc: A refreshing greatsword that makes people feel the breath of spring. Let's run across the prairies with the Prairie Dragon Claymore!

PassiveProperties.Name: Increases damage dealt according to own HP
PassiveProperties.Desc: Boosts damage dealt when HP is full

PassiveProperties.Name: Increases damage dealt according to own HP
PassiveProperties.Desc: Boosts damage dealt when HP is full

Info.Name: Black Dragon Claymore
Info.Desc: A greatsword that hosts the power of the ancient Black Dragon. It's said that one slash can be as powerful as a dragon's breath.

Info.Name: Shin/Black Dragon Claymore
Info.Desc: A greatsword containing the power of the ancient Black Dragon. One slash is as powerful as a dragon's breath.

Info.Name: Magic Crystal Claymore
Info.Desc: A greatsword that exists in the gap between this world and the afterworld. It can cleave formless ghosts in two.

Info.Name: Million Buster
Info.Desc: (Input Description) Million Buster

Info.Name: Crystal Snow
Info.Desc: A greatsword consisted of Snow Crystals, which scatters snow flakes when wielded.

PassiveProperties.Name: Increases damage dealt when with Frozen
PassiveProperties.Desc: Increases damage dealt to Frozen targets

PassiveProperties.Name: Increases damage dealt when with Frozen
PassiveProperties.Desc: Increases damage dealt to Frozen targets

Info.Name: Thunder Claymore
Info.Desc: (input description) Thunder Claymore

Info.Name: Magma Buster
Info.Desc: (input description) Magma Buster

Info.Name: Battlefield Buster
Info.Desc: (input description) Battlefield Buster

Info.Name: Silpheed
Info.Desc: A greatsword that hosts the power of the Spirits of Wind. While slashing, a windblade will burst forth, cutting everything around it.

Info.Name: Croc Slayer
Info.Desc: A crude greatsword that can crush Crocs. The scales of a Croc, which are harder than rock, are like a pudding before this Croc Slayer.

Info.Name: Steel Claymore
Info.Desc: Proof of becoming an Adept-level Blacksmith. It's heavier than it looks and will move one's whole body when swinging.

Info.Name: Razorbeak Slayer
Info.Desc: A greatsword that works well on Razorbeaks. Even the usually noisy Razorbeaks will become as quiet as a calm lake.

Info.Name: Fire Behemoth Slayer
Info.Desc: (Updated greatsword description)

Info.Name: Undine
Info.Desc: (Updated greatsword description)

Info.Name: Turtle King Buster
Info.Desc: Turtle King Buster (Updated greatsword description)

Info.Name: Dragon King Claymore
Info.Desc: A greatsword that embarks on a journey with its ownerone that they cannot turn back on. Risk everything to destroy your foes.

Info.Name: Dragon King Claymore
Info.Desc: A two-handed sword that embarks on a journey its ownerone that they cannot turn back on. Risk everything to destroy your foes.

PassiveProperties.Name: Increases Critical Rate according to own HP
PassiveProperties.Desc: Boosts critical rate when HP is full

PassiveProperties.Name: Increases Critical Rate according to own HP
PassiveProperties.Desc: Boosts critical rate when HP is full

Info.Name: Forest Buster
Info.Desc: Proof of defeating the Great Forest Bear. It's able to evoke the strange power that crushes the earth.

Info.Name: WolfGreatsword
Info.Desc: An extremely strong and heavy greatsword that can conquer any powerful enemy.

PassiveProperties.Name: Significantly increases damage dealt according to own HP
PassiveProperties.Desc: Largely boosts damage dealt when HP is full

PassiveProperties.Name: Significantly increases damage dealt according to own HP
PassiveProperties.Desc: Largely boosts damage dealt when HP is full

Info.Name: Darkness-tainted Claymore
Info.Desc: Corrupted Sword (description)

Info.Name: Cob Corn Claymore
Info.Desc: A stylish sword imitating grilled corns. It's flat because it's been pressed with a grill net.

Info.Name: Silvertooth Claymore
Info.Desc: A claymore that hosts the power of the Silvertooth. A sword that freezes enemies when swung.

Info.Name: Stained Glass Claymore
Info.Desc: A claymore symbolizing church glass. The glass seems to be fractured yet unbreakable.

Info.Name: Chimera Claymore
Info.Desc: A claymore symbolizing the ferocious Chimera. Because it's consisted of a variety of alloys, it can deliver heavier blows than you would expect from its appearance.

Info.Name: Kadomatsu Claymore
Info.Desc: A sword made in the image of a Kadomatsu. Although it's a claymore, it doesn't seem to be very sharp.

Info.Name: (New Greatsword Name)
Info.Desc: (Updated greatsword description)

Info.Name: Hazevore Claymore
Info.Desc: The passion of a Blacksmith's soul is imbued into the sword's blade like a flame. With a powerful swing, your surroundings will turn into a sea of flames.

Info.Name: Shin/Hazevore Claymore
Info.Desc: The fiery soul of a Blacksmith resides in the blade of this claymore in the form of flame. Swinging this great sword can turn the surrounding area into a sea of fire.

Info.Name: Enma Blade
Info.Desc: The secret treasure of Enma's family.   It's said to be infused with strong Yo-kai power that rivals that of the gods.

Info.Name: Shin/Enma Blade
Info.Desc: A secret treasure handed down by the Enma family. It's said to be infused with strong Yo-kai power that rivals that of the gods.

Info.Name: Goryu Claymore
Info.Desc: A greatsword that exists with the despair of its owner. It can turn light into darkness, and hope into despair.

Info.Name: Dotanuki/Winter Cat
Info.Desc: A large sword modeled after a cat Yo-kai with a wound of honor engraved on its forehead.

Info.Name: Destructive Might
Info.Desc: A powerful, sharp sword made by a bladesmith in a foreign land.

PassiveProperties.Name: Significantly increases Dodge Counter DMG
PassiveProperties.Desc:
Significantly increases
Dodge Counter damage dealt

PassiveProperties.Name: Significantly increases Dodge Counter DMG
PassiveProperties.Desc:
Significantly increases
Dodge Counter damage dealt

Info.Name: Princess Chaos
Info.Desc: It's said that those who own it but lack strength will be unable to unleash this sword's potential ability.

Info.Name: High Allagan Guillotine
Info.Desc: A high-performance greatsword that uses the technology of an ancient civilization.

Info.Name: Koryu Claymore
Info.Desc: An exotic sword with a sharpness that surpasses others. It was named Koryu Claymore due to its appearance and radiant light, and it has now flown here.

Info.Name: Bluesword Levin
Info.Desc: A water sword sealed with the Power of the Four Gods. Its power can create violent torrents that swallow everything.

PassiveProperties.Name: Blessing of 4 Gods [Water]
PassiveProperties.Desc:
The Power of the Four Gods
grants increased HP, SP, and Water-type attack.

PassiveProperties.Name: Blessing of 4 Gods [Water]
PassiveProperties.Desc:
The Power of the Four Gods
grants increased HP, SP, and Water-type attack.

Info.Name: Enryu Claymore
Info.Desc: The foreign Enryu Claymore, which exists together with the Koryu Claymore. It echoes evil hearts.

Info.Name: Absolute Finisher
Info.Desc: A supreme sword with a sharp red and black blade. It can unleash a powerful blow that rivals blades that have experienced many battles.

Info.Name: (New Greatsword Name)
Info.Desc: (Updated greatsword description)

Info.Name: Sheep Bow
Info.Desc: A bow that can make the sheep honest. It allows the target being shot to see an illusion of cute sheep and then instantly fall into a drowsiness.

Info.Name: Sniper's Eyes
Info.Desc: Even in heavy rain, this bow can hit the center of a target 100 meters away.

Info.Name: Artemis Bow
Info.Desc: (input description) Artemis's Bow

Info.Name: Falcon Wings
Info.Desc: A large bow of falcon wings that can tear through wind to catch its prey. Has the ability to increase shot speed.

Info.Name: 5-Star Prom. Test Bow
Info.Desc: Promotion Test Rarity 5 Bow_Description

Info.Name: Meteor Bow
Info.Desc: A bow based on the shining constellations in the night sky. The arrows fired continuously are like meteor showers.

Info.Name: Guardian Bow
Info.Desc: A bow used by undercover agents of the kingdom. It makes them able to blend in with the forest and pierce the enemy quietly.

Info.Name: Fire Archer
Info.Desc: A bow that hosts the power of Fire. Frantically shoots crimson arrows that surround the enemy formation like a whirlpool of flames.

Info.Name: Ice Archer
Info.Desc: A bow that hosts the power of Water. It can lead the enemies into a world below the freezing point by firing frost arrows in succession.

Info.Name: Leaflet Archer
Info.Desc: A bow that hosts the power of Earth. Calmly shoots emerald arrows that punish outlaws in the name of stars.

Info.Name: Gale Archer
Info.Desc: A bow that hosts the power of Wind. Countless arrows are entwined with a rotating blade, shredding enemies at speeds that exceed supersonic.

Info.Name: Wolf's Shot
Info.Desc: The bow of a noble wolf soul who lives and dies with the Hunter, its master. It never shows mercy to wolves baring their fangs at humans.

Info.Name: Red Bird
Info.Desc: A bow with the soul of a giant bird reborn from the ashes. A bird surrounded by flames will dance with the arrows, and its flames will surround shot enemies.

Info.Name: Bigbeak Shooter
Info.Desc: A bow made with Bigbeak feathers. Even a giant bird dancing gracefully in the sky will be as fragile as a young bird with this bow aimed at it.

Info.Name: Hornet Bow
Info.Desc: A bow that can hit annoying buzzing bees flying around and calm them down. The tip tastes slightly sweet.

Info.Name: Unicorn Bow
Info.Desc: A pure white bow that only people without malicious intent are allowed to touch. It's surrounded by a faint halo.

Info.Name: Crystal Bow
Info.Desc: (input description) Crystal Bow

Info.Name: Prairie Dragon Bow
Info.Desc: A bow made by gathering the power of Earth. It can pierce through Wind-type defense and shoot fatal arrows.

Info.Name: Beak-drilling Hazard
Info.Desc: A dangerously bow that contains the power of Queerax, which is said to have once destroyed the world. Possesses the ability to "defend against unpreventable poisons."

PassiveProperties.Name: Virus Assistance
PassiveProperties.Desc: Significantly increases ATK and Earth ATK.

PassiveProperties.Name: Poison Side Effect
PassiveProperties.Desc: Boosts "Virus Assistance", but Wind RES is significantly reduced.

PassiveProperties.Name: Virus Assistance
PassiveProperties.Desc: Significantly increases ATK and Earth ATK.

PassiveProperties.Name: Poison Side Effect
PassiveProperties.Desc: Boosts "Virus Assistance", but Wind RES is significantly reduced.

Info.Name: Fallen Owl
Info.Desc: A bow for night Hunters. Strange sound waves flying around can accurately capture enemies hidden in the dark.

Info.Name: Black Dragon Bow
Info.Desc: (input description) Black Dragon Bow

Info.Name: Taurus Horned Bow
Info.Desc: Its arrows shot with the momentum of raging waves can stop a savage bull's advance with one shot. It's a must for head-on conflicts with cattle.

Info.Name: Great Bird's Bow
Info.Desc: Proof of defeating the King Bigbeak. A tautly-pulled arrow will pierce through a Queerax.

Info.Name: Princess Bird's Bow
Info.Desc: Proof of defeating the Queen Bigbeak. When its arrows are let loose, all enemies will kneel.

Info.Name: Black Hunter
Info.Desc: Not even the most dexterous of beasts can escape this dark Hunter. A bow very suitable for hunting leopards.

Info.Name: Wargod's Bow
Info.Desc: Proof of a Carpenter reaching the level of Expert. The luxurious decoration does not shame its name.

Info.Name: Elegant Rose
Info.Desc: A noble bow that only famous Hunters are allowed to touch. Its burning arrows of cleansing will rain down on the battlefield.

PassiveProperties.Name: Significantly increases Fury growth of the second half of basic attack combo
PassiveProperties.Desc:
Significantly increases Fury growth brought by
the 4th and following moves of basic attack combo

PassiveProperties.Name: Significantly increases Fury growth of the second half of basic attack combo
PassiveProperties.Desc:
Significantly increases Fury growth brought by
the 4th and following moves of basic attack combo

Info.Name: Wind Bow
Info.Desc: (Wind Bow description)

Info.Name: Poseidon's Bow
Info.Desc: A large bow named after the king of sea. Arrows released when the bowstring is pulled to its limit can cut through the sea and penetrate the sky.

Info.Name: Bee-style Bow
Info.Desc: Proof that a Hunter took the initiative to reconcile with the bees, a perennial enemy. Become a knight in service to the Hive Queen.

Info.Name: Sunflower Bow
Info.Desc: A bow that accumulates power by sunbathing. The degree to which the flower is opening indicates how much light has been accumulated.

Info.Name: Sunflower Bow
Info.Desc: A bow that accumulates power by sunbathing. The degree to which the flower is opening indicates how much light has been accumulated.

PassiveProperties.Name: Increases Fury according to own HP
PassiveProperties.Desc: Boosts Fury growth when HP is full

PassiveProperties.Name: Increases Fury according to own HP
PassiveProperties.Desc: Boosts Fury growth when HP is full

Info.Name: Darkness-tainted Bow
Info.Desc: A bow that has forgotten its past missions. Despite being contaminated, it still gleams with a faint light.

Info.Name: Snowpard Arrow
Info.Desc: Proof of defeating the queen of snow. The trajectory of frost arrows is very, very white.

Info.Name: Fire Hunter's Bow
Info.Desc: A special bow that only the chosen can hold. It burns with fiery light with its owner.

Info.Name: Mermaid Princess
Info.Desc: A bow blessed by the motherly sea. The arrows fired are like dancing mermaids.

PassiveProperties.Name: Defeating an enemy insignificantly restores SP
PassiveProperties.Desc: Defeating an enemy insignificantly restores SP

PassiveProperties.Name: Defeating an enemy insignificantly restores SP
PassiveProperties.Desc: Defeating an enemy insignificantly restores SP

Info.Name: Sliced Watermelon
Info.Desc: A stylish bow imitating a sliced watermelon. How many slices is this watermelon divided into? Everyone has different opinions.

Info.Name: Red-nosed Reindeer
Info.Desc: A bow based on an Xmas reindeer. It makes you feel like you can soar into the sky.

Info.Name: Pegasus Bow
Info.Desc: A bow symbolizing a beautiful Pegasus. Although it's so light that its weight can hardly be felt, it will never break.

Info.Name: Sakura Bow
Info.Desc: A bow whose arrows are based on early cherry blossoms that start to dance once they're shot.

Info.Name: Wonder Raven
Info.Desc: A bow that symbolizes the orb of the great forest. It's said that if you own it, you will be granted the power of the Great Tree.

PassiveProperties.Name: Significantly increases chance of applying Poison
PassiveProperties.Desc: Significantly increases chance of applying Poison

PassiveProperties.Name: Significantly increases chance of applying Poison
PassiveProperties.Desc: Significantly increases chance of applying Poison

Info.Name: Leviathan's Blue Scales
Info.Desc: A bow that symbolizes the sea dragon and contains the hidden power to smooth rough seas.

Info.Name: Shin/Leviathan's Blue Scales
Info.Desc: A bow crafted in the shape of the sea dragon and contains the hidden power to calm the violent seas.

Info.Name: Wiseman's Long Bow
Info.Desc: A large bow modeled after a bratty Yo-kai who claims to be a Yo-kai butler.

Info.Name: Arc Magic Bow
Info.Desc: A bow made when sealing the power of ancient monsters. Its design is modeled after the beasts of the time.

Info.Name: Arched Liberation
Info.Desc: A bow made with mechanical power. It hosts the power of thunder and lightning and has the suppressing power of proud warlords.

PassiveProperties.Name: Significantly increases Charged Skill DMG
PassiveProperties.Desc: Significantly increases Charged Skill damage dealt

PassiveProperties.Name: Significantly increases Charged Skill DMG
PassiveProperties.Desc: Significantly increases Charged Skill damage dealt

Info.Name: Sage Staff
Info.Desc: A living staff that will lose its glory if it's held by an unworthy person. It can give the owner endless mana.

Info.Name: Sage Staff
Info.Desc: A living staff that will lose its glory if it's held by an unworthy person. It can give the owner endless mana.

Info.Name: 5-Star Prom. Test Staff
Info.Desc: Promotion Test Rarity 5 Staff_Description

Info.Name: Master Staff
Info.Desc: A staff passed down from master to disciple over generations. The memories of magic engraved on the staff will flow into the mind of its new owner.

Info.Name: Spook Staff
Info.Desc: What a spook looks like after living in the staff for a thousand year. It can eliminate spooks in an instant.

Info.Name: Frog Staff
Info.Desc: A staff made in the appearance of the king of frogs. It croaks loudly when swung. Works very well on frogs.

Info.Name: Flame Pillar Staff
Info.Desc: A staff that hosts the power of Fire. It can make flames dance as if they were alive and smash them into groups of enemies.

Info.Name: Current Staff
Info.Desc: A staff that hosts the power of water. Water spears sharper than blades will fall on the enemy's head.

Info.Name: Sprouting Staff
Info.Desc: A staff that hosts the power of Earth. The vitality overflowing from it can turn wasteland into forest.

Info.Name: Windword Staff
Info.Desc: A staff that hosts the power of Wind. Lets you control the weather as you please and create downpours.

Info.Name: Librarian Staff
Info.Desc: An ancient staff that contains all the magic knowledge in the world. It has served sages for a long time.

Info.Name: Heart Staff
Info.Desc: The staff of loving kindness that contains the power of recovery. Simply holding this staff will make you unilaterally loved by all creatures.

Info.Name: Hermit Staff
Info.Desc: An uncomfortable staff that emits a low sound. It's been discarded for a long time. It can draw out powers that exceed the limits of its host.

Info.Name: Flower Staff Aria Fleur
Info.Desc: A staff based on flowers. Its design makes it easier for Magicians to chant.

PassiveProperties.Name: Residue in the Staff
PassiveProperties.Desc:
Significantly increases
Wind ATK and Wind RES.

PassiveProperties.Name: Residue in the Staff
PassiveProperties.Desc:
Significantly increases
Wind ATK and Wind RES.

Info.Name: Sealing Staff
Info.Desc: A staff with a terrifying magic power that can turn splashes of water into cannonballs.

Info.Name: Kingdom Staff
Info.Desc: A staff that has witnessed everything from a country's birth to its disappearance.

Info.Name: Crystal Staff
Info.Desc: (Crystal Staff description)

Info.Name: Wind Staff
Info.Desc: Wind Staff (description)

Info.Name: Black Dragon Staff
Info.Desc: A staff decorated with the scales of the Black Dragon defeated by adventurers. Although trivial, it's indeed the best equipment for obtaining the power of the Black Dragon.

PassiveProperties.Name: Significantly increases ATK of the 4 elements
PassiveProperties.Desc: Largely increases Fire, Water, Wind, and Earth damage dealt

PassiveProperties.Name: Significantly increases ATK of the 4 elements
PassiveProperties.Desc: Largely increases Fire, Water, Wind, and Earth damage dealt

Info.Name: Shin/Black Dragon Staff
Info.Desc: A staff decorated with the scales of the Black Dragon defeated by adventurers. A masterpiece that grants a bit of the Black Dragon's power.

PassiveProperties.Name: Significantly increases ATK of the 4 elements
PassiveProperties.Desc: Largely increases Fire, Water, Wind, and Earth damage dealt

PassiveProperties.Name: Significantly increases ATK of the 4 elements
PassiveProperties.Desc: Largely increases Fire, Water, Wind, and Earth damage dealt

Info.Name: Prairie Dragon Staff
Info.Desc: Although small in size, it can unleash powerful magic that rivals the breath of the Prairie Dragon. It's a terrifying staff that cannot be judged by its appearance.

Info.Name: Slumber Wand
Info.Desc: A staff that inherited the soul of the Red Dragon. Can unleash a fiery breath that deals extra damage to burning enemies.

Info.Name: Crown Wand
Info.Desc: A royal staff containing the power of Light. Its hidden mana can purify the darkness.

Info.Name: Weedling Wand
Info.Desc: A staff with a cute Weedling doll tied to the front. It will twist after absorbing mana.

Info.Name: Sylph Wand
Info.Desc: (input description) Sylph Wand

Info.Name: Skytree Wand
Info.Desc: Skytrees, the saints of land, made into a hand-held size. Its mana is greater than you'd imagine.

Info.Name: Mystical Staff
Info.Desc: A mysterious staff that is effective against Jelling monsters. It's better not to go too deep.

Info.Name: Sweets Wand
Info.Desc: Sweets Wand

Info.Name: Royal Spook Staff
Info.Desc: The staff of the ruler of the spook kingdom, where a large number of the dead are gathered. The more adept at threatening they are, the higher the title.

Info.Name: Emperor Frog Wand
Info.Desc: A staff made in imitation of the first emperor of the Frog Empire's staff. On a dimly moonlit night, all frogs will sing to the emperor.

Info.Name: Darkness-tainted Staff
Info.Desc: Corrupted Sword (description)

Info.Name: Horoscope Scepter
Info.Desc: An ancient staff with a mission. It will emit a ray of light for its master when they advance in the dark.

Info.Name: Horoscope Scepter
Info.Desc: An ancient staff with a mission. It will emit a ray of light for masters who advance in the dark.

Info.Name: Luna Plana
Info.Desc: One of the two staffs that received Celestia's blessing. Blessed by the moon, it contains divine power.

PassiveProperties.Name: Significantly increases Charged Skill DMG
PassiveProperties.Desc: Significantly increases Charged Skill damage dealt

PassiveProperties.Name: Significantly increases Charged Skill DMG
PassiveProperties.Desc: Significantly increases Charged Skill damage dealt

Info.Name: Luna Plana
Info.Desc: One of the two staves that received Celestia's blessing. Blessed by the moon, it contains divine power.

Info.Name: Icewand Cocytus
Info.Desc: A frozen staff that refuses life. People who are not recognized by this staff will be frozen in never-melting ice.

PassiveProperties.Name: Significantly increases chance of applying Frozen
Significantly increases chance of applying Frozen

Info.Name: Icewand Cocytus
Info.Desc: A frozen staff that refuses life. People who are not recognized by this staff will be frozen in never-melting ice.

PassiveProperties.Name: Significantly increases chance of applying Frozen
Significantly increases chance of applying Frozen

Info.Name: (New Staff Name)
Info.Desc: (Updated Staff description)

Info.Name: Windcalling Staff
Info.Desc: An ancient staff that hosts the spirit of the Wind. Two komainu will appear as spirits to determine whether one is qualified to wield Hermes' Bow.

PassiveProperties.Name: Fury
PassiveProperties.Desc:
Critical attack dealt
increases Fury significantly

PassiveProperties.Name: Fury
PassiveProperties.Desc:
Critical attack dealt
increases Fury significantly

Info.Name: Ice-crystal Wand
Info.Desc: A staff that hosts the power of ice. It can freeze the moisture in the air and enhance the power of ice.

Info.Name: Pleasantly Cool Staff
Info.Desc: A stylish staff made in imitation of a uchiwa fan. This fan can fight against the scorching heat!

Info.Name: Candy Wand
Info.Desc: A staff decorated as an Xmas candy cane. Lick it, it's really sweet!

Info.Name: Sea Lord's Staff
Info.Desc: A staff that symbolizes the solemn Poseidon. The beard on this staff has a good feel and can increase the wielder's concentration.

Info.Name: Rice Cake Staff
Info.Desc: A staff decorated with rice cakes. Because it has no mana, it's not suitable for fighting.

Info.Name: Mysticane
Info.Desc: An ominous skeleton-like staff.   The demonic red eyes contain powerful spells. It's said that only those who have mastered the sorcery can use it.

Info.Name: Chaos Legion
Info.Desc: The staff of a king that rules all monsters. It's said a weakling who holds it will immediately be turned to ashes.

Info.Name: Chaos Legion
Info.Desc: A token belonging to the leader of all monsters. Legend has it that if a king who lacks power holds it, he will turn to ashes.

Info.Name: Whitedog Staff
Info.Desc: "Oh my swirls!" A white staff forged in the likeness of a canine Yo-kai with this mantra.

Info.Name: Astral Staff
Info.Desc: A magic instrument designed by a legendary sorceress, said to create utter destruction.   It's said to have been made from crushed stars.

Info.Name: Zenith Stardust Staff
Info.Desc: A magic instrument designed by a legendary sorceress. The use of a rare elixir has increased its brilliance and strength.

Info.Name: Igniting Staff
Info.Desc: A staff with mad mana sealed within. If someone is unable to control the staff's power, it will burn them to ashes.

PassiveProperties.Name: Significantly increases damage dealt according to own HP
PassiveProperties.Desc: Largely boosts damage dealt when HP is full

PassiveProperties.Name: Significantly increases damage dealt according to own HP
PassiveProperties.Desc: Largely boosts damage dealt when HP is full

Info.Name: Glacial Staff
Info.Desc: A staff with mad mana sealed within.   If someone is unable to control the staff's power,  it will freeze them.

PassiveProperties.Name: Significantly increases damage dealt according to own HP
PassiveProperties.Desc: Largely boosts damage dealt when HP is full

PassiveProperties.Name: Significantly increases damage dealt according to own HP
PassiveProperties.Desc: Largely boosts damage dealt when HP is full

Info.Name: Dionysus
Info.Desc: A staff passed down as an heirloom in a  renowned family of people who are trained to  listen to the voices of spirits.

Info.Name: Zenith Dionysus
Info.Desc: This staff is the heirloom of a famous family that once produced many people who could hear the voices of the spirits.

Info.Name: Moonlight/Nova
Info.Desc: One of the two staffs that received Celestia's blessing. It has the ability to enhance Goddess Power.

Info.Name: Azure Wing Sword
Info.Desc: A sword imitating the wings of a bird who controls the wind. Its blows are as sharp as a storm.

PassiveProperties.Name: Insignificantly increases Fury growth of the second half of basic attack combo
PassiveProperties.Desc:
Insignificantly increases Fury growth brought by
the 4th and following moves of basic attack combo

PassiveProperties.Name: Insignificantly increases Fury growth of the second half of basic attack combo
PassiveProperties.Desc:
Insignificantly increases Fury growth brought by
the 4th and following moves of basic attack combo

Info.Name: Shin/Azure Wing Sword
Info.Desc: A one-handed sword imitating the wings of a bird who controls the wind. Its blows are as sharp as a storm.

PassiveProperties.Name: Insignificantly increases Fury growth of the second half of basic attack combo
PassiveProperties.Desc:
Insignificantly increases Fury growth brought by
the 4th and following moves of basic attack combo

PassiveProperties.Desc:
Insignificantly increases Fury growth brought by

Info.Name: Devil Sword/Nekomaru
Info.Desc: A blade made based on a legendary cat Yo-kai who roamed the land and eventually became a samurai.

Info.Name: Damocles
Info.Desc: A sword made of Lady Hell's blood mixed with rare ore from the Devildom. It can burn all who touch it.

Info.Name: Yggdrasil Wand R
Info.Desc: A staff made with the goal of recreating the Holy Staff. Although it's incomparable to the real thing, it works in concert with the Yggdrasil Wand.

Info.Name: Yggdrasil Wand
Info.Desc: A holy staff made by combining the countless crystallized prayers to the Sage Staff and a branch of the distant Divine Tree.

Info.Name: Sirenia R
Info.Desc: A bow made with the goal of recreating the power of the Spirit of Water. Although it's incomparable to the real thing, it works in concert with Sirenia.

Info.Name: Sirenia
Info.Desc: The form of a mermaid princess who unleashed her true power after obtaining the power of the Spirit of Water.

Info.Name: Ultimate Power R
Info.Desc: A sword made with the goal of recreating the Ultrasteel Sword. Although it's incomparable to the real thing, it works in concert with the Ultimate Power.

Info.Name: Ultimate Power
Info.Desc: A sword made by recasting Destructive Might using ultrasteel from a foreign land. Sharp enough to rend the sky asunder.

PassiveProperties.Name: Speedy
PassiveProperties.Desc:
When the blade is drawn,
Charge time over 12 sec-50%

PassiveProperties.Name: Speedy
PassiveProperties.Desc:
When the blade is drawn,
Charge time over 12 sec-50%

Info.Name: Treeshade's Horned Bow
Info.Desc: A bow made by the animals that inhabit Elderwood. It has the strong power of the Earth.

Info.Name: Wolf Fang R
Info.Desc: Made with the goal of recreating Wolf Fang. Although it's incomparable to the real thing, it works in concert with the Wolf Fang.

Info.Name: Wolf Fang
Info.Desc: An even sharper version of Wolf Greatsword that risks the wielder's sanity. It's sharp enough to crush the earth with ease.

PassiveProperties.Name: Damage dealt when HP is full [15%]
Damage dealt when HP is full [15%]

Info.Name: Tim Durandal
Info.Desc: A staff born out of the desire to destroy the world. It must not fall into villainous hands.

PassiveProperties.Name: Increases Fury when landing a critical strike
PassiveProperties.Desc: Increases Fury when landing a critical strike

PassiveProperties.Name: Increases Fury when landing a critical strike
PassiveProperties.Desc: Increases Fury when landing a critical strike

Info.Name: Dragon Blade R
Info.Desc: A replica of the taboo claymore of darkness. Although it's incomparable to the real thing, it works in concert with the Dragon Blade.

Info.Name: Dragon Blade
Info.Desc: A claymore that has been sealed because it's too dangerous. Its overwhelming power is enough to sway the survival of this world.

Info.Name: Ice Cream Summer
Info.Desc: A must-have for summer!  Use the power of sweets to beat both the heat and evil!

Info.Name: Sword Axe Valkyrie
Info.Desc: A weapon of a female warrior that has been long sealed away. It may look like an axe for woodcutting, but it's actually meant for combat. It possesses a vigorous power to crush its targets.

Info.Name: Damocles II
Info.Desc: A sword made in imitation of the Damocles. It's basically just a decorative sword, but that's where its charm is.

Info.Name: Test Sword Unused
Info.Desc: Unused test sword_description

Info.Name: Borrowed Sword
Info.Desc: A plain sword you can borrow for free. It's not much, but better than nothing.

Info.Name: Borrowed Rapier
Info.Desc: A plain rapier you can borrow for free. It's not much, but better than nothing.

Info.Name: Borrowed Claymore
Info.Desc: A plain greatsword you can borrow for free. It's not much, but better than nothing.

Info.Name: Borrowed Blade
Info.Desc: A plain katana you can borrow for free. It's not much, but better than nothing.

Info.Name: Borrowed Bow
Info.Desc: A plain bow you can borrow for free. It's not much, but better than nothing.

Info.Name: Borrowed Staff
Info.Desc: A plain staff you can borrow for free. It's not much, but better than nothing.

Info.Name: Borrowed Bracelet
Info.Desc: A plain bracelet you can borrow for free. It's not much, but better than nothing.
